briefTitle: Investigation of PicoPrep Versus HalfLytely for Bowel Preparation for Colonoscopy - Split Dose PicoPrep
officialTitle: A Randomized, Assessor-Blinded, Multi-Center Study Investigating the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of "Split-Dose" PicoPrep™ for Oral Administration Versus HalfLytely® for Colon Cleansing in Preparation for Colonoscopy
summary: Subjects undergoing an elective complete colonoscopy will randomly receive either PicoPrep: 2-sachets for oral solution in two divided doses given a night before (first dose - sachet) and approximately 5 hours prior to procedure (second dose - sachet) or HalfLytely: for oral solution and two 5 mg Bisacodyl tablets, given the day before the procedure to evaluate its effectiveness, tolerability and safety.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Classified as Successes (Excellent and Good Ratings) According to the Aronchick Scale As Assessed by a Blinded Gastroenterologist
